it.polimi.se2.meteocal.control

Class EventManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2.meteocal.control.EventManager

  • public class EventManager
extends Object
    Control class that takes care of the event management: create, delete, update and search Event entities

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EventManager() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canCurrentUserAlterEvent(Event event)
      Checks if the current user can alter (update or delete) the given event
      void delete(Event event)
      Method to delete an event from the database, together with all its notifications
      Event getCurrentUserEventById(int id)
      Similar to "getEventById" but also checks if the organizer of the event is the current user
      Event getEventById(int id)
      Query that gets an event by its ID
      List<Event> getEventsByDate(Date date)
      Query to get all the events at the given date for the current user
      List<Event> getEventsForBadWeatherAlerts()
      Query to get all the events for bad weather alerts: finds all outdoor events in the current user's calendar that take place tomorrow
      boolean isEventOrganizedByCurrentUser(Event event)
      Checks if the current user is the organizer of the given event
      void save(Event event)
      Method to save the event in the database
      void saveBadWeatherAlertSent(Event event)
      Method to update a persisted Event entity setting the boolean "badWeatherAlertSent" to true
      void saveWeatherForecast(String forecast, Event event)
      Method to update a persisted Event entity with a weather forecast
      void sendInvitations(Event event, Set<User> invitedUsersList)
      Sends invitations regarding the given event to the given users
      void update(Event event)
      Method to update an event already in the database

        public void sendInvitations(Event event,
                            Set<User> invitedUsersList)
        Sends invitations regarding the given event to the given users
        Parameters:
        event: - the event linked to the notifications
        invitedUsersList: - the list of the users that need to receive the invitation

      • saveWeatherForecast

        public void saveWeatherForecast(String forecast,
                                Event event)
        Method to update a persisted Event entity with a weather forecast
        Parameters:
        forecast: - the String containing the event forecast description
        event: - the event that needs to be updated

      • saveBadWeatherAlertSent

        public void saveBadWeatherAlertSent(Event event)
        Method to update a persisted Event entity setting the boolean "badWeatherAlertSent" to true
        Parameters:
        event: - the event that needs to be updated

      • getEventsByDate

        public List<Event> getEventsByDate(Date date)
        Query to get all the events at the given date for the current user
        Parameters:
        date: - the day in which the events take place
        Returns:
        the list of the events at the given date; null if none found

      • getEventById

        public Event getEventById(int id)
        Query that gets an event by its ID
        Parameters:
        id: - the ID of the event
        Returns:
        the event with the given ID if found, null otherwise

      • getCurrentUserEventById

        public Event getCurrentUserEventById(int id)
        Similar to "getEventById" but also checks if the organizer of the event is the current user
        Parameters:
        id: - the ID of the event
        Returns:
        the event with the given ID if found and the organizer is the current user, null otherwise

      • isEventOrganizedByCurrentUser

        public boolean isEventOrganizedByCurrentUser(Event event)
        Checks if the current user is the organizer of the given event
        Parameters:
        event: - the event to check
        Returns:
        true if the current user is the organizer

      • canCurrentUserAlterEvent

        public boolean canCurrentUserAlterEvent(Event event)
        Checks if the current user can alter (update or delete) the given event
        Parameters:
        event: - the event to check
        Returns:
        the value returned by isEventOrganizedByCurrentUser(event)

      • getEventsForBadWeatherAlerts

        public List<Event> getEventsForBadWeatherAlerts()
        Query to get all the events for bad weather alerts: finds all outdoor events in the current user's calendar that take place tomorrow
        Returns:
        the list of the events for bad weather alerts, possibly null
